channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Input Step Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline: Input Step Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-34177|2024-08-03T08:16:17.208Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%3A%20input%20step%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline: Input Step Plugin 448.v37cea_9a_10a_70 and earlier archives files uploaded for `file` parameters for Pipeline `input` steps on the controller as part of build metadata, using the parameter name without sanitization as a relative path inside a build-related directory, allowing attackers able to configure Pipelines to create or replace arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller file system with attacker-specified content.
